description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior
